name: Zotefoams Evazote Bivy Sleeping Pad - Unisex
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description: This 5-millimetre thick foam pad has good resiliency thanks to its high 18 percent EVA content. Its smaller size makes it a good choice for surprise bivies. Evazote® pads are physically blown with pure nitrogen gas for durability. Flexible to –70 degrees Celsius, it’s also abrasion and UV resistant.Dimensions are 150 x 50cm
